channel.title: Blog on zzamboni.org
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on zzamboni.org

item.title: CFEngine posts moving to cf-learn.info
item.description: I have been blogging about CFEngine here for a while (it's my most frequent tag). As of now, I'm starting to post all CFEngine-related posts to http://blog.cf-learn.info/, which is part of the web site for my book "Learning CFEngine 3". In this way, I intend to group all CFEngine-related content over there. I will still cross-post relevant things here, but if you want to stay fully up to date on my CFEngine writings, please subscribe over there as well.
